Author: PM_ME_YER_SHIBA_INUS
Text: As vaguely and non-suddenly as possible, while still making it clear what you're referring to.

Author: radicalcantaloop
Text: I think it might be better received if you just bring up that you’re concerned about their quick weight loss. Then they can tell you if there’s something wrong (whether ed related or not).   I know that I would be super freaked out if someone came up to me asking if I had an ED (bc even though I do, it’s super personal to me and I’m a very private person), so I would personally just bring up that I’m concerned about something being wrong, and not necessarily bring up any specific issues that might be causing their weight loss.  Good luck with talking to your friend!!
